Text: work Status Cc Frank I spoke with Rick this morning He mentioned that he would discuss my work status with you He also asked me to send you my forwarding address for all future enron correspondence Please send mail to Rudi Zipter W th Court Overland Park Kansas regards RZ

Addison Sterlingpst Rick Our baby Addison Sterling was born on Saturday January th at PM She was fairly big lbs ozs and she is inches long Ive attached a link to the hospitals website that has her picture she is much cuter in person of course We named her after Addison St which runs by Wrigley Field Home of the Chicago Cubs and the Pound Sterling Cami is doing well and we have returned home on Sunday night nurserybabyDetailsasphospitalIDsearchlistbabyID RZ
